Request a delivery report for each message you send.
Delete old messages when the maximum number of messages is reached.
Make sounds and show icon in status bar when you receive messages.
Show a preview of received messages on the status bar and lock screen.
Show and allow the subject field to be edited when forwarding multimedia messages.

Unable to receive message. Device memory full. Delete some items.

This is DRM file. Buy it?

This message includes attached files not shown.
If you do not want to replace file, rename it.
Not enough memory in phone memory. Delete some items and try again.

Not enough memory in phone memory. Delete some items and try again.
Unable to attach. File not supported.
To use restricted media types, change your multimedia message creation mode setting.
Unable to attach file. File size too large. Try sending via Email, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, etc.
Security policy restricts text message composition.
You are about to send your message to a 7-digit number. If this is a phone number, you need to use the full 10-digit number, including the area code. Do you want to add an area code?
WAP push message received. Make a call?
Unable to add some recipients. Their numbers are not valid.
You can only send messages to your fixed dialing numbers.
Unable to retrieve current location. Try again later.
Wait while items are added to slideshow.

"%s's lost device has been locked and powered on by the Samsung Find My Mobile service."

Multimedia messages not supported by network.
Are you sure you want to restore default settings?
Tap here to play the tone.
Tap here to stop tone preview.
Tap Refresh to search for your location again or tap OK to continue without a location.
Unable to save template without content.
Duration must be longer than %d seconds.
Duration must be shorter than %d seconds.
Application does not have necessary permissions.
%d messages in SIM card will be deleted.

If you add quick responses, you will see them here.
Manage messages stored on your SD card.
Allows delivery reports to be sent.
Bring the device close to your ear to call this contact.
Use the Volume key to change the font size.
Change text size using the zoom lever.
Messages that contain %s will be reported as spam.
%s will be registered as a spam number.
Numbers starting with %s will be registered as spam numbers.
Numbers ending with %s will be registered as spam numbers.
Numbers including %s will be registered as spam numbers.
Numbers starting with %s cannot be registered as spam.
Number must be at least 3 digits.
Words must be at least 4 characters (2 Korean characters).
Words must be at least 4 characters (2 Chinese characters).
Words must be at least %d characters.
Number not registered to this service provider (%d)
Number not registered to this service provider (%d)
Number not registered to this service provider (%d)
Connect to data services while roaming is turned off.
Number not registered to this service provider (%d)
User not registered to this service provider(%d)
Unable to connect to PLMN network (%d)
Failed to register location. Some functions will not work in this area (%d).
Invalid number. Domestic roaming not allowed (%d).
Mobile networks are currently blocked. To use mobile networks, contact the customer service center.

"Data services only available via LTE.
To use 3G, go to Settings > More networks > Mobile networks > Data network mode > 3G only."
Send messages as group conversations by default

"All messages are billed per recipient at your plan's standard rates.
"Group conversation:" Like email, all recipients with compatible phones can see everyone on the “To” list and reply to everyone. Sent as multimedia messages.
"Individual messages:" Like an email “Bcc” list, recipients can't see anyone on the list and can reply only to you. Sent as text messages."
Welcome to Samsung! Your device is registered.
This date is in the past. Change to a different date or time.
Scheduled messages must be set more than %d minutes before scheduled time. Set again.
Message must be scheduled to be sent within a year. Set again.
This message is scheduled to be sent at %s. Tap OK to send now instead.
Unable to add location. Still loading address…
Location messaging is not supported by this service provider.
Media item has no location information.
Location indices are not available for this image.
Unable to access media cursor for image in Gallery.
Location not supported by this image type.
Not all location sources are currently turned on. For faster location detection, turn on Wi-Fi location settings.
Not all location sources are currently turned on. For faster and more accurate location detection, turn on GPS location settings.
Existing message attachments will be discarded. Continue?
Location attachment will be discarded. Continue?

"Share your: -current location -saved locations, or -places of interest
by attaching it to your message. Location messages are treated as MMS messages on your bill.
When searching for places on the map, data usage is billed according to your plan.
By using location messaging, you consent to the collection and use of information regarding the location of this device and disclosure of location information to third parties in order to deliver these location-based services. There is no representation, warranty or guarantee of the reliability, accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of any data sent using this location-based service.
Certain software or technical information is provided and licensed by third parties, including Telecommunications Systems, Inc., which may be covered by one or more U.S. patents or pending U.S. patent apps, as well as their counterparts, pending European and international patents."
Unable to send multimedia messages in GSM area only.
Unable to send multimedia messages. Turn on mobile data.
Message will be copied to SIM card.
Selected messages will be copied to SIM card.
Play a sample emergency alert tone.
Alert tone will sound on device. Notification volume will be same as device volume.
Selected text templates will be deleted.
Selected text template will be deleted.
This quick response will be deleted.
Tap the %s compose message icon to compose a message.
Tap the compose message icon to compose a message.
SIM card is not inserted or cannot store text messages.
Failed to copy your messages to your SIM card. Tap OK to try again.
Set which alert types to receive
Locked scheduled message will be canceled.
Unable to copy scheduled message to SIM card.
This device could not be activated. If a new USIM card has been inserted, try restarting your device 2-3 times. If this error persists, please contact a Retail Store or Customer Service.
Network error occurred. Emergency calls only.
Multimedia message service is not available in GSM area.
Unable to send messages while making %d call.
Security policy restricts multimedia message downloading.
Unable to play sound during call.
Message failed. Would you like to retry?
Emergency alerts can be turned off from the alert message.
Re-assembles multi-segment messages so they can be shown as a single message
The selected item will be deleted.
Unable to connect to mobile networks while Airplane mode is turned on. This message will be sent when Airplane mode is turned off.
Mobile data is turned off. This message will be sent when Mobile data is turned on.
Data roaming is turned off. This message will be sent when data roaming is turned on or when you leave the roaming area.
No signal found for mobile networks.
"Write a recipient's name after the command to jump to the messaging composer."
Write a message after the command to jump to the messaging composer.
Write a message after the command to send %s a message.
Please enter a new file name
Group/MMS conversation(s) cannot be saved at this time.
Restore saved messages to your inbox.
Would you like to receive all emergency alerts in the future?
If not, you may set the alert types you want to receive in the Messaging > Settings > Emergency alert.
Call block list full. Delete some items.
You can talk with recipients who have turned on the Group messages function. Messages will be sent as multimedia messages.
Send messages as group conversations by default.
Messages will be sent as multimedia messages for group conversation.
New update available. Updating via mobile networks may incur additional charges. If possible, update via WLAN.
Smart block automatically blocks messages that may be fraudulent, or contain advertising spam. To filter messages containing spam phrases, turn on smart block.
This service is provided by Tencent Mobile Phone Manager.
Include original text in outgoing message
Has the problem you reported been resolved? If you have the same problem again, contact us either by telephone (%1$s), mobile (%2$s), or fax (%3$s).
Hover your pen over this area.
Hover your finger over this area.
Hover your pen or finger over this area.
Now you know how to use information preview.
Press the pen button while hovering your pen over this area.
Tap the content that you want to insert.
Tap the contacts you want to add as recipients.
Unable to add favorite. Maximum number of favorites reached. Delete some favorites.
Unable to send messages in Airplane mode.
Receiving multimedia messages while roaming will not incur extra charges.
"Unable to send/receive multimedia messages. Data roaming is off. Go to Settings to turn data roaming on."
When requesting a delivery/read report, the recipient name must be %d characters or less.

"This provides you with emergency alerts, such as evacuation instructions, in case of natural disasters.
Emergency alert messages are a public safety service provided as a collaboration between the National Emergency Management Agency, service providers, and mobile device manufacturers. You may not receive messages if there is a problem with your device or if network conditions are poor."
To view full message text, tap the More button.
Sign in to your %1$s to use %2$s. Tap OK to sign in.
This number will be added to your spam numbers.
The number has been removed from spam numbers.
Add numbers you want to register as spam.
Add phrases you want to register as spam.
Receive SMS notification when message is read.
Notifies you via SMS when the recipient has read the message you sent.

This service notifies you via text message when the recipient has received or read the text message you sent. This will incur additional charges. Details of this service can be found by searching for text message delivery notifications or registered text messages at www.olleh.com.
This video file is too large and will be resized.
You have selected a sound & shot file. Sound data is not supported for multimedia messages so only the picture will be attached.
Some recipients only have email addresses saved, not phone numbers. To send to their email addresses, the message will be converted to a multimedia message.
Web addresses received in messages will be active links. This may expose you to phishing scams.

Following unknown links leaves your device and personal data vulnerable. By tapping OK, you agree that you are solely responsible for any damage to your device or loss of data that may result from following this link.
Tap to hear caller information read aloud.
Open cover to view message details.
Change the notification settings for each SIM card.
Change the cell broadcast settings for each SIM card.
Exceeds one page. Continue to send?
Ultimate standby mode allows only 4 applications: Phone, Contacts, Messaging, and Clock
Unable to send message. Ultimate standby mode does not support multimedia messages.
Unable to send scheduled message. Ultimate standby mode does not support multimedia messages.
To prevent phishing, receive notifications when applications with the authority to send or receive messages are installed.
Delay the sending of your messages so that they can be canceled if needed. The cancel button will be shown for a specified time after you tap Send.
No contacts added. %d contacts already exist on the list.
Unable to add priority senders. Maximum number of priority senders (%d) reached.
Tap here to set %s as your default messaging application.
By setting %s as your default messaging app, you can enjoy all the messaging features that your apps have to offer.
Tap %1$s to set %2$s as your default messaging app.
To change default messaging application, go to %s.
Do you want to change your default messaging app to Samsung Messages?
The maximum number of priority senders (%d) has been reached.
Text message delivery reports temporarily unavailable.
Unable to create message or save draft. Memory full. Delete some files or applications.
Allow links in messages to be followed.
The maximum number of characters (%d) has been exceeded.

In your current input mode, special characters, such as emoticons and letters with diacritics, may not be shown correctly on the recipient device. To resolve this, go to %s, and set the input mode to Automatic.
Change the input mode to Automatic by going to Settings > Messages > Text messages > Input mode.

"To use this function, download the following application:
%s"
Changing data service network will disconnect network currently in use. Change data service network?
Change the auto retrieve settings for each user card.
This application is authorized to access Messages. Tap OK to manage the authorization settings.
The device will use data through the currently connected WLAN network.
This application is requesting permission to access the items below. Allow?
Failed to report number as spam number.
This number will be reported as a spam number and will be added to Spam numbers.

"Easy report service for mobile spam is only for the report mobile spam, so this must not be used any other purposes. When you report spam, it is received at Korea Spam Response Center(KSRC) of Korea Internet and Security Agency(KISA), and the report includes the items below : sending number, callback number, received time, reported time, title, contents and mobile number of reporter, etc. These items can be used for an investigation, administrative disposition, refusal of reception. According to the case, these can be provided to the proper organizations, but these items shouldn't be provided to any other organizations in the case of refusal of reception. If you want to check the reports, you can find them on the website of KSRC(www.spamcop.or.kr). And if you have any other questions, please call (without prefix number) 118 or access the website. Thank you."
